message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money, but you'll get something too. This is just the first round, so we can always negotiate more later!
Alice, that's a terrible deal for me! Let's be realistic. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  Take it now, because the value decreases significantly for you in the next round.
Okay, I'll compromise a bit.  40/60 is closer to your proposal. Let's get this done before the money depreciates further.
